ðŸ“– Summary: GoFr is a GoLang framework designed to accelerate microservice development. It provides built-in support for databases and observability, simplifying the creation and deployment of microservices, especially within Kubernetes environments. The framework offers features like simple API syntax, REST standards, configuration management, gRPC support, and health checks.
